SEQUENCE.NARRATION: Having finished all of your assignments early, you decided to take this opportunity to continue working on your Planet Gazorpazorp Galactic Music Competition
Since you lack proper vocal training, you start thinking about ways to manipulate sound using the Source.

DIALOGUE.SPEECH: Right, this shouldn't be too difficult.
Once I figure out how to manipulate sound with the Source, I'll win this competition with my boundless creativity and finely tuned musical sense, and become a galactic music icon!
